title: Dummi Bears
description: The Dummi Bears work in Dummi-Land to turn sad boys and girls into happy boys and girls. Includes Dummi Bears the Movie: The Land Without Smiles.
quote: Sing the Happy Happy Happy Happy Happy Happy Song!
alt2: bears in the clouds pointing heart arrows down at the United States
alt3: one bear saving another bear from an icy river
alt4: two bears with a welcoming gesture
